summary: Noted Celebrity Photographer, Michael Grecco, sets out to capture the essence of the AVN Awards and Convention where the best in American Pornography is displayed, celebrated and honored.
cast: Michael Grecco|Tera Patrick|Evan Seinfeld|Simon Karmarkar|David Lee|Heather Veitch|Tanya Huerter|Lori Albee|Rick Plank|Jesse Jane|Paul Fishbein|Sunny Lane|Joanna Angel|Nautica Thorn|Matt McMullen|Diamond Back Annie|Lucky Lana|Grand Maitre de Valmont|Bing|Rob Rotten|Phyllisha Anne|Nyeema Knoxx|Luc Wylder|Alexandra Silk|Janine Lindemulder|Julia Ann|Ross Winner|Peter North|Suzuki|Randy West|Steve Hirsch|Mike Hodges|Shelby Hodges|Brittney Skye|Greg Fitzsimmons|Sandee Westgate|Evan Stone|Stormy Daniels|Ron Jeremy|Mary Carey|Paul Thomas|Jenna Jameson|Larry Flynt|Cytherea|McKenzie Lee
title: Naked Ambition: An R Rated Look at an X Rated Industry
